music.title: Discover my music
music.description:
Outside of coding, music plays an essential role in my life. Iâ€™ve been playing guitar for many years, with a special love for saturated, atmospheric, and energetic sounds. From psychedelic rock to stoner, sometimes touching on heavier metal influences.

During my two years in Rennes, this passion came to life through an album project with three musician friends: Hugo, Charles, and Adrien. Together, we crafted a sound that reflects who we are, blending progressive rock, psychedelia, and heavier sonic journeys.

about.smallDesc: Hi! Iâ€™m NoÃ©, a fullstack developer with a bit of a project manager mindset. Iâ€™m passionate about visuals, sound and movement,  always ready to learn and build things. Scroll down if you want to know more about my slightly offbeat journey ðŸ‘‡
about.resume:
Fullstack developer, I've gained experience in a Parisian agency where I designed modern and reliable web applications. I create clear, fast and sustainable solutions.



Recently, I took a step back by spending a year in New Zealand. This experience gave me fresh perspective and more motivation to contribute to ambitious projects.

part1.title: Hey, Iâ€™m NoÃ©
part1.text: I just got back from a year-long van road trip across New Zealand. I took a break from coding to focus on exploring, meeting people, and capturing the landscapes through photography. That journey gave me fresh perspective, new ideas, and even more motivation to create.

part2.title: From math teacher to developer
part2.text: I studied for a Masterâ€™s degree in Digital Project Management in Rennes, where I specialized in fullstack development. That dual profile gave me both technical and strategic skills: clean coding, solid architecture, but also client communication, planning, and teamwork. I originally planned to become a math teacher, I liked the logic and precision, but I eventually found coding to be the perfect balance between logic, creativity, and impact.

part3.title: Development in agencies and in teams
part3.text: I've had the opportunity to work in web agencies where I evolved as a fullstack developer. I designed custom applications with modern stacks like Next.js and Nest.js, while mastering complete project cycles: client exchanges, needs tracking, sprint organization. These experiences taught me to code cleanly, structure ambitious projects, and collaborate effectively within teams.

part4.title: What drives me outside of code
part4.text: Outside of development, I'm passionate about music and photography. I love composing, experimenting with sound, capturing moments, theyâ€™re creative outlets that complement coding well: they require precision, intuition, and attention to detail. To stay balanced after long hours in front of the screen, I turn to swimming and climbing, two sports that help me stay focused, grounded, and energized.

item3.diploma: Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science
